edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class PreScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.PreScene

  • public class PreScene
extends java.lang.Object
    PreScene provides a way to put a pop-up on the screen before a level begins. A PreScene can include arbitrary text and pictures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PreScene() 

    • Method Summary

      Add some text to the PreScene
      static void addText(java.lang.String text, int red, int green, int blue, java.lang.String fontName, int size)
      Add some text to the PreScene, and center it vertically and horizontally
      static void setExpire(float duration)
      The default is for a PreScene to show until the user touches it to dismiss it.

      • addText

        public static void addText(java.lang.String text,
           int x,
           int y,
           int red,
           int green,
           int blue,
           java.lang.String fontName,
           int size)
        Add some text to the PreScene
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display
        x - X coordinate of the text
        y - Y coordinate of the text
        red - Redness of the text color
        green - Greenness of the text color
        blue - Blueness of the text color
        fontName - The font file to use
        size - The size of the text

      • addText

        public static void addText(java.lang.String text,
           int red,
           int green,
           int blue,
           java.lang.String fontName,
           int size)
        Add some text to the PreScene, and center it vertically and horizontally
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display
        red - Redness of the text color
        green - Greenness of the text color
        blue - Blueness of the text color
        fontName - The font file to use
        size - The size of the text

      • addImage

        public static void addImage(java.lang.String imgName,
            int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height)
        Add an image to the PreScene
        Parameters:
        imgName - The file name for the image to display
        x - X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - Y coordinate of the bottom left corner
        width - Width of the image
        height - Height of the image

      • setExpire

        public static void setExpire(float duration)
        The default is for a PreScene to show until the user touches it to dismiss it. To have the PreScene disappear after a fixed time instead, use this.
        Parameters:
        duration - The time, in seconds, before the PreScene should disappear.
